rukus.text: paṟayuka: manuṣyaruṭe rakṣitāvinēāṭ ñān śaraṇaṁ tēṭunnu

manuṣyariluṁ jinnukaḷiluṁ peṭṭavar. #===================================================================== # # Quran Translation # Name: abdul hamīd & paṟappūr # Translator: Cheriyamundam Abdul Hameed and Kunhi Mohammed Parappoor # Language: Malayalam # ID: ml.abdulhameed # Last Update: April 2, 2012 # Source: Tanzil.net # #======================================================
